definition:
, an old method of printing that (AS. æt, edhæt) the "y" taking the place of the old letter "Þ"). Cf. Ye, the.

an old method of printing that (AS. þæt, ðæt) the "y" taking the place of the old letter "thorn" (þ).  Cf. Ye, the.

an old method of printing that (AS. þæt, ðæt) the "y" taking the place of the old letter "thorn" (þ).  Cf. Ye, the.
